TextJPN: 『澪尽し』へのゲートは、@r＜X.その後の世界＞の『X1 事件報告３』@r＜X.その後の世界＞の『X2 事件報告４』@r＜X.その後の世界＞の『X3 事件報告５』@r＜K.解明の世界＞の『K6 解々し編のカケラ』@r…以上のカケラを見つけると、＜L.希望の世界＞の『L3 澪尽し編のカケラ』が出てくるの。
TextENG: In order to get ``Miotsukushi,``@r``X1 Incident Report 3`` in the World of Afterwards@r``X2 Incident Report 4`` in the World of Afterwards@r``X3 Incident Report 5`` in the World of Afterwards@r``K6 A Fragment of Tokihogushi`` in the World of Elucidation@r...When you find all of the above fragments, ``L3 A Fragment of Miotsukushi`` will appear in the World of Hope.

TextJPN: それを選択した後に出てくる『L4 逆回りの歯車』を見て、もう一度『L3 澪尽し編のカケラ』を見れば進めるようになるわ。
TextENG: If you look at ``L4 Reversing the Gears`` after selecting that one, then look at ``L3 A Fragment of Miotsukushi`` once again, you will be able to proceed.
